settings.head: 1. Shop
settings.message: My message goes hereInventory and price transparency are here. Easily browse through Nissans batteries eligible for second-life with prices based on remaining state-of-health.

settings.head: 2. Select
settings.message: Once you are ready to checkout, please review your cart one final time, then submit the order. You will receive an order confirmation, and there will be no payment due at the time of checkout.

settings.head: 3. Sit Back & Relax
settings.message: A submitted order will trigger Currents to arrange freight. Once we receive a quote from the carrier, we will send an invoice with your batteries plus the cost of freight. Expect this invoice 1-3 business days from the day the order was submitted.

settings.head: 4. Square Up
settings.message: For the order to be shipped, the invoice must be paid in full. When the invoice is paid, Currents will send another email with tracking information when the carrier picks the batteries up.

settings.head: 5. Scale Up
settings.message: The final step is you receiving your order of batteries. Our mission is for second-life integrators to spend less time sourcing and more time scaling.
